reference.shortdesc: The publishtype element indicates whether there are any restrictions on the availability of the book.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The value attribute is required to specify the type of availability, for example, beta release, limited availability, or general availability.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The publishtype element is specialized from data. It is defined in the bookmap module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: For this element, the value attribute specifies any restrictions on the availability of the publication.
section.draft-comment: This seems redundant since it's also captured in the Usage information section.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the publishtype element can be used to specify any restrictions on the availability of the book. In this example, there are no restrictions.
